text: Martin Luberda (born 18 December 1991) is a Slovak football defender who currently plays for Poprad. ==Club career== ===1. FC Tatran Prešov=== Luberda made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Tatran PrešovMFK Ružomberok - 1. FC TATRAN Prešov 16.07.2016, futbalnet.sk against Ružomberok on 16 July 2016. ==References== ==External links== * 1.
